::: {.question}

**Debt Issuance with Placement Fee — Sizing to Target Net Proceeds**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(webexercises); library(knitr)
set.seed(605)
target_net_m <- round(runif(1, 8, 20), 3)
fee          <- round(runif(1, 0.012, 0.035), 4)
gross_m      <- target_net_m / (1 - fee)
fee_paid_m   <- gross_m * fee
ansA <- round(gross_m, 3)
ansB <- round(fee_paid_m, 3)
cat(sprintf("Target net proceeds: <b>R$ %1.3f million</b> | Placement fee: <b>%1.2f%%</b>",
            target_net_m, 100*fee))
```

The company issues bonds **at par** and pays a **placement fee** (as a % of face).  
1) How much **face value** (million R$) must be issued to net the target?  
2) How much is the **total fee paid** (million R$)?

::: {.question-block}

  <input type="number" id="module6_num_q3a" name="module6_num_q3a" step="0.001" style="width:220px;"
         data-correct-answer=`r ansA` data-tolerance="0.01" />
</form>

<div id="feedback-module6_num_q3a" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ \( \text{Face} = \dfrac{\text{Target Net}}{1-\text{fee}} = \) <b>`r ansA`</b> million.
</div>
:::

::: {.question-block}

  <input type="number" id="module6_num_q3b" name="module6_num_q3b" step="0.001" style="width:220px;"
         data-correct-answer=`r ansB` data-tolerance="0.01" />

<div id="feedback-module6_num_q3b" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
